{{Infobox command
| name = listd
| oplevel = 3
| hidden = 1
}}

Lists detail information about [[player]]s on the [[server]].

== Syntax ==
: <code>listd</code>

== Result ==
Lists players on the server and returns details in JSON format if possible.

=== Return message example ===
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
There are 1/10 players online:
Torrekie
###*
{
  "command":"listd",
  "result":[
    {
      "color":"ff5454ff",
      "name":"Torrekie",
      "randomId":11413744675090775566,
      "uuid":"45f4943f-cb75-37cb-87a8-873d8abfff8f"
    }
  ]
}
*###
</syntaxhighlight>
